paragraph.paragraph: This section of the documentation covers aspects of managing your EiffelEnvision projects. Management ranges from the simple Project Configuration after ../adding_projects/index.xmlAdding New Projects to managing your project's items and contents.

project_configuration/index.xml Configuring Projects
Documentation of the various configuration property aspects of an EiffelEnvision project.

adding_references/index.xml Project References
The documentation on adding, removing and configuring EiffelEnvision project component references.

adding_items/index.xml Adding New and Existing Items
Documentation on how to add new and existing file and folder items to an EiffelEnvision project.

removing_items.xml Removing Items
Information on what and how project items can be removed.

item_exclusion.xml Including and Excluding Items
Information on including and excluding Eiffel source files from a ../../../compiling_projects/index.xmlBuild.

environment_variables.xml Using Environment Variables
The details on configuring EiffelEnvision projects using environment variables.
